scripts.start: set REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common&set  REQUEST_LOG_FILE=access.log&set NOTES_MODEL=MYSQL&set  SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/note/storage/sequelize/sequelize-mysql.yaml&set USERS_MODEL=models/users-rest&set USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333/&set DEBUG=note-app:*&set NOTES_MODEL&npm run bin
scripts.start-fs: set REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common&set REQUEST_LOG_FILE=access.log&set NOTES_MODEL=FS& set USERS_MODEL=models/users-rest& set USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333/& set DEBUG=note-app:*&npm run bin
scripts.start-sequelize-mysql: set REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common&set REQUEST_LOG_FILE=access.log&set NOTES_MODEL=MYSQL&set SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/note/storage/sequelize/sequelize-mysql.yaml& set USERS_MODEL=models/users-rest& set USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333/&set DEBUG=note-app:*&npm run bin
scripts.start-mongodb: set REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common&set REQUEST_LOG_FILE=access.log&set NOTES_MODEL=MONGO_DB&set MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/chap07&set DEBUG=note-app:*&npm run bin
scripts.debug: set REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common&&set REQUEST_LOG_FILE=access.log&&set NOTES_MODEL=models/note/snpmtorage/notes-fs&&set DEBUG=note-app:* & npm run bin
